website_summaries.verdict: A full-featured membrane gaming keyboard at a really nice price, although it may fall short for some buyers in areas such as configurability.
pros: Backlit gaming keyboard, with 3 brightness modes
Compatible with Windows, iMac, MacBook, and Linux OS
Comes with a free cleaning kit
cons: While this option is backlit, the lights aren't configurable
Has a wrist rest that is hard plastic, and not very comfortable
While it will work with a Mac, it does not feature a Mac keyboard layout

customer_reviews.title: Spacebar chooses not work 50% of the time. It looks kinda cool though, I guess.
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard is incredible if you like bright colors and a space bar that may or may not actually work. I mean it was probably a defective unit because I can't imagine 203 people being pleased with this incredible "feature", but anything is possible I suppose. 0/10 would not buy a broken keyboard again.
customer_reviews.author: G.G.

customer_reviews.title: Nice keyboard. Everything works on mac OSX while pressing ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice keyboard. Everything works on mac OSX while pressing FN, brightness down doesn't. To fix this: - system preferences > keyboard > shortcuts > display - click the f14 key assigned to decrease brightness, i set my new one to f9 - click the f15 key assigned to increase brightness, set it to f10 - now you can control brightness with f9 and f10 The keyboard shipped quickly and came with a brush and a tool to remove the keys. It can flash RGB in and out or stay solid. The brightness of the backlight can also be adjusted. The LEDs are stationary as displayed in the picture. It seems to be responsive.
customer_reviews.author: George D. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great Keyboard .
customer_reviews.text: This is a great keyboard ,I have bought 3 so far and this is the best of the bunch . Other two I purchased first on did not work well after first week space bar would stop working and the second came crushed on delivery second came with keys that stuck up and when you picked it up keys popped off . I have had no problems with this one .Keys light well and it is easy to see .Keys Light up in rainbow colors across the board (blue, green then red.) I really like this keyboard . 100% satisfied would recommend .
customer_reviews.author: Donald Rutter

customer_reviews.title: I figured out how to fix the spacebar sensitivity issue
customer_reviews.text: so this keyboards great aside from the fact that it lost like 50% of my space bar presses so I went and took a look underneath the space bar and the little button it presses needs like the whole thing to be pressed all at once so i went and taped a thin piece of cardboard to the bottom of the part of the space bar that presses the button and now it works perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Melody

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this keyboard originally as a temporary replacement for a much more expensive keyboard. The first one I received from Amazon arrived DOA and I returned it. HOWEVER, a week later I received an email from the seller apologizing for the issue with an offer to send me a replacement free of charge for my troubles. 5 star customer service! After using it for a few days now I can say that I like it. The keyboard is fairly heavy so it doesn't move around much and seems solid. Thankfully I haven't had to test out the waterproof feature. Overall it's a good solid keyboard and unbeatable at the price point.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Flankem

customer_reviews.title: Mac users beware.
customer_reviews.text: While this is advertised as being suitable as a Mac keyboard, the traditional control, alt/option, and command keys are not in the order they should be. I'm not ready to undo decades of muscle memory to try and use the GK100's layout of these three keys. That said, it looks cool, has a good tactile feel, the wrist rest is well placed. I just can't recommend it for Mac users and am returning it.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Great keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Works great, looks great, feels great. The only reason I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 is sometimes if you don't push the spacebar hard enough it puts 2 spaces in instead of just 1, which doesn't really make sense to me. It was easy for me to adjust how hard I push the spacebar though so that it only puts 1 space in so it's not really a big deal. You have to have the rainbow lights on in order to see the keys though so if you don't like static rainbow lights then get something else, but if you don't mind then this works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Johnson

customer_reviews.title: They are lit & they work fine
customer_reviews.text: Feels a little cheap, but they are lit, including the identifier on the keys. That is what I wanted. Have not used it much to be able to speak of durability. And I’m not a gamer. But this keyboard does the job. I’m using it with my laptop as the keyboard on the laptop has a problem, not all the keys work. So plugged this in & am able to continue to use the laptop, saved me the money & hassle of taking it somewhere to get fixed or buying a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Kau Lehua

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, especially if you're not afraid of colors
customer_reviews.text: I had another backlit keyboard that had served me well for two years, then some of the keys just jammed and, frankly several of the keys had rubbed clear (whatever else some may do, I USE my keyboards). The RedImp came at an attractive price, and I liked their dedication to keys that did not fade with time and use. It may look like I am typing on the Jamaican flag, but I love the feel of the keys. Definitely happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Freeman Williams

customer_reviews.title: Keys stopped working
customer_reviews.text: After having this product for 3 months, the space key has started to die. Leaving double or triple spaces with one press, which you'll notice in this review. Sadly I can't return it now but I did get a warranty so I'll see what I can do with that. Sad part is, gotta call into the warranty comopany and it's only open regular business hours so it'll take a lunch break to get it done. Anyways, was hoping this would be a good viable and cheap gaming option, like my Magic Eagle mouse, but sadly it's not reliable. Won't purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: A. Nielsen

customer_reviews.title: Good  heavy duty  construction, space bar delay
customer_reviews.text: Pet peeve. Enter key is in the wrong position. Find myself having to correct myself. Otherwise good quality keyboard. Going to get a keyboard with the right layout. There is also a one second delay on the space bar. Others have reported this "bug" as well. If you type average or fast you will notice the delay on the space bar which makes this keyboard almost unuseable . It wont' register a space if you type too fast or don't press the space bar all the way down and hold it there. The seller issued me a full refund no questions asked.
customer_reviews.author: Mike F. Hageali

customer_reviews.title: I love this keyboard
customer_reviews.text: After using this for a while now, I love this keyboard. It took me a bit to get used to the raised keys but it seems that I can type a bit faster. The LED lights work great and look cool. This keyboard seems to be built in a pretty sturdy way. I haven't spilled anything on it (yet) though.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Ralph

customer_reviews.title: Keyboard is great but not made for Mac
customer_reviews.text: Low priced with backlit LEDs.. Quality is so, so. The ENTER key is weirdly placed (1985 IBM) which is fine if you like it. The biggest complaint I have is that this is NOT a keyboard for MAC. It is a generic USB keyboard and has no specific MAC keys, so it is missing the Option/Apple key. Essentially unusable with a Mac. FALSE ADVERTISING. Edit: I raised the star review because the company refunded my purchase price. So i appreciate their effort to make the situation better. Still, be aware this is not a Mac keyboard
customer_reviews.author: DaveKMDJD

customer_reviews.title: Spacebar  broken on  new  unit
customer_reviews.text: On a brand new unit, space bar either doesn't work, or if you press hard enough, it'll work but you have a 50% chance that it'll insert two spaces. Yes, this was typed on the keyboard before I returned it. No, I didn't doctor it except to keep pressing the spacebar until a space (or double space) appeared.
customer_reviews.author: Jb

customer_reviews.title: I like the brightness of the keyboard and that it doesn't ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the brightness of the keyboard and that it doesn't shine too brightly and that the keyboard is smart enough to not run when my laptop is off (one of the USB ports has charging capabilities that run some keyboards and mice when the laptop is off), but I get a lot of double spaces when I type.
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: Terrible keystroke response, gaming or otherwise.
customer_reviews.text: Got this initially for my girlfriend's iMac. She and I are both fast typists (100 wpm). Keyboard response was too slow and some characters didn't even register. Gave it to my son to try on his PC. Slower typist, same issue, to the point where he couldn't even game with it properly. No drivers were available from the vendor, and trying on 3 different PCs produced the same results. Keyboard looks stunning, otherwise, but as I missed the return window it's going to have a second life as a shelf.
customer_reviews.author: M. Cristel

customer_reviews.title: I hate this keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Unless you're looking over the top of it, you can't read the keys. They used a really bad font and if the cheap lights are off, you can't see ANYTHING. This keyboard SUCKS and it keeps putting two spaces in. The font sucks The lighting sucks It sucks. and I've been suffering with it for two years.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Jensen

customer_reviews.title: First gaming keyboard ever and it didn't disappoint
customer_reviews.text: Our gaming son wanted this, mostly for the cool lights. But I've used it several times. The one thing I personally don't like is that they keys stick up higher than a standard keyboard. But maybe that's a gamer thing?? He loves it, it has never let us down and the LED lights change color so he is happy. Two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: El Conquistador

customer_reviews.title: Spacebar problems
customer_reviews.text: Keyboard looks and feels amazing(for the most part). The only downside is when you press spacebar anywhere but in the middle, it double spaces whatever you're trying to type. It gets extremely annoying after awhile, especially while trying to type an essay or any of the sort. Other than this MAJOR flaw, the keyboard is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: CaptorRaptor

customer_reviews.title: works wonderfully allows me to type in dark
customer_reviews.text: works wonderfully allows me to type in dark,keys work beautifully, as someone mentioned in another review the layout around shift/enter is weird but got used to it quickly, the matching mouse left some to be desired "skipped" around but keyboard is top notch
customer_reviews.author: ga boy

customer_reviews.title: Gift worth the effort
customer_reviews.text: My husband is difficult to buy for. I got this for his desk top for his late night computer surfing. He says it is great as now he does not have to turn on ANY lights to see what he's typing.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa C

customer_reviews.title: Cool LED keyboard for 20 bucks
customer_reviews.text: Everything works, lights are cool. The hand rest is a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Occasional enthusiast

customer_reviews.title: Good delivery, Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Good delivery , Nice quality. Love that the letters won't rub off like my previous 3 keyboards. Only Complaint is there is only 3 brightness levels and they are all to bright. Though I can Turn it off but that negates the reason on I purchased it. The Cycling effect is annoying. Wouldn't recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Kinda short but nice
customer_reviews.text: The only issue I have with keyboard is it is about 2 inches shorter lengthwise than the other keyboards... Guess it will take a few to get used to... Easy setup, just plug it in. The letters and numbers kinda look like stencil letters though...
customer_reviews.author: Robin Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Great Keyboard, but space bar does not work properly.
customer_reviews.text: I started using the keyboard right away. I saw some reviews about the lighting, but it isn't a bother for me, however, I'm not a gamer. I'm a programmer. I simply needed an extra keyboard that isn't the typical Mac Keyboard. All of the keys on this keyboard feel great to me, except for the space bar. For some reason, out of the box, it needs to be pressed very hard, so I'm basically smacking it every time lol. I really like it, but I can't give a good recommendation, because the spacebar does not technically work as a general consumer would assume.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: the | key is in the wrong place.
customer_reviews.text: the \ and | keys are in the wrong place. Also, the low blue lighting on black background is impossible to see. Keys are a little loud, other than that, its fine. I just cant get over the | key being in the wrong place. If you are a Linux user and use the pipe command, i would not buy this keyboard. I am going to throw this one in the trash and get another keyboard that has the | in the right place.
customer_reviews.author: gointomexico

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and Inexpensive Keyboard.
customer_reviews.text: For a $22 keyboard I have been very impressed. I find the keyboard shape comfortable and natural for my hands. The keys themselves feel awesome! They have a good tactile feedback and just the right amount of "clickiness." The backlighting is nice, it has a three different brightness options and a pleasing glow which makes gaming, or typing in the dark quite nice. My keyboard at work is a Corsair that's about 4 times as expensive, and this one, at least where feel and performance are concerned, is right up there with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great RGB Gaming Keyboard for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely affordable gaming keyboard. The lighting is not to bright as to distract me while playing and so far is functioning flawlessly. No issues, just plug it in and you're all set :) My only wish is that it had separate keys for the volume control... holding function and trying to do so during gaming is quite a pain, but not a deal breaker for me.
customer_reviews.author: bear989us

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good For The Price
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard is actually pretty good for the price. I had to use it temporarily. I enjoyed the wrist rest and it is very sturdy. I also love how the keys are double shot. However, the keys are not visible if light is turned off and they are poorly drawn on the keys.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Liamkin

customer_reviews.title: double space
customer_reviews.text: I like the lighted background, and it seems to be an ok keyboard when I bought it. But I don't think I'll be using it long. I write a lot and every time I press the space bat instead of one space it gives two every other time. It's annoying because I have to go back and delete that extra space. That malfunction alone cost me more time when I write because I have to go back and delete the extra spaces.
customer_reviews.author: Sirius

customer_reviews.title: Backlight has a mind of its own
customer_reviews.text: My backlight on the keyboard randomly turns off by itself. No key stroke, nothing. Just come in and its black. I can't see the letters at all. I was able to get the lights back on one time by following some online directions, but the second time darkness. Have had this thing less than 6 months and now I can't see what is on any keys.
customer_reviews.author: G Dub

customer_reviews.title: Space bar does not work sometimes or sometimes does two spaces; ISSUE RESOLVED
customer_reviews.text: The problem is that the space-bar sometimes does not result in a space as we hit it or sometimes does two spaces. This is very crucial for any programmer, document writing etc. etc.,Hence one star. I hope the manufacturer sees this message and does a refund or replace the keyboard with a working one. Will update this if I get help from the seller/manufacturer. Update (Feb 19, 2019) : I got a replacement Keyboard from the manufacturer. It has been working fine for the last few days. The manufacturer was very responsive and kept a good communication channel via email going. Now I am satisfied with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Sankara Yadavalli "A.Guru"

customer_reviews.title: Its a great keyboard!!
customer_reviews.text: So this keyboard is great for the price and I've had it for about two weeks and i first tested on a few games and it worked well. I now am trying to type a paper and it either registers it as me tapping the space-bar twice (which causes me to constantly erase the second tap) or it doesn't register my single tap. I really wish it didn't do that, as both are really annoying, but it might be the reason it cost only $20 or it might just be I got a defective one.
customer_reviews.author: Dayana

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Have had this keyboard for a few months now. It has held up to all my gaming and video editing. Totally worth it if you are looking for something to keep up with you. Might not have all the bells and whistles but if you are looking for something that feels good to type on this is it
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Nice keyboard
customer_reviews.text: In all honesty a very good keyboard, it’s mechanical so obviously it has the clanky keys that everyone loves, it’s soft though when you push down no real hard plastic hitting each other. The keyboard only lights up it doesn’t have an affect or anything it’s just on or off, nice colors tho. None of the lights have gone bad keys are sturdy honestly not a bad keyboard I just feel like more design could’ve been nice.
customer_reviews.author: Dalton Huff

customer_reviews.title: works great, looks cool
customer_reviews.text: looks awesome, bought for my mom to type at night she loves the different colors.
customer_reviews.author: Renzo P.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Rage Wrist Rest!
customer_reviews.text: SO happy with this keyboard, and the wrist rest is amazing. A lot of the times I angry finger type quickly and it is easier to rest my wrists on the slopped area of the keyboard so I can finish my ranting rage posts. Thanks Redimp! <3 And now I am so grateful that I can spill my coffee in all my rages. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Pips

customer_reviews.title: Am wondering if it  was  a  used  product.
customer_reviews.text: In case you didn't notice this keyboard adds extra spaces between words. In addition the markings on some of the keys look like they're halfway rubbed off already. Not a good buy even if they reduce the price. It's throwing money away. Don't buy.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Cordray

customer_reviews.title: The Space Bar is Horrible
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this keyboard I was exciting to use it, but however whenever I am typing it was suddenly double space instead of single space as you can see right now as I type it is doing this. I am going to back to school again and I would rather not keep backspacing whileim typing my papers or have to backspace because I didn't hit thespace bar hard enough. I'm not correctinganyerrrors so youcan see what imtalking about it.Nicekeyboard but horriblespace bar, I donotrecommend this at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The board response is excellent and the feel of the keys is firm
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased this keyboard. The board response is excellent and the feel of the keys is firm. The keyboard is back lit in Blue, Green, and Red. On the brightest setting the Blue portion of the keyboard is not as bright as the Green and Red. I don't know if it is the light that is the problem or the color Blue. If not for that, I would have rated the board 5 Stars.
customer_reviews.author: Mike W.

customer_reviews.title: Redimp reveiw
customer_reviews.text: Excellent keyboard for the price point. Had planned to buy the RGB version, but due to flying finger syndrome, ordered the wrong one. Keys have a good feel when typing, led backlight is good when using in low light.
customer_reviews.author: CAT

customer_reviews.title: Full size, wide, lighted.
customer_reviews.text: New job at the pc 8 hours a day 5 days a week, I needed a new full size keyboard. This is perfection. The only bad thing is the location of the windows key under the shift key. I've accidentally hit that. Everything went blank. I didn't know what happened
customer_reviews.author: TSC Awareness

customer_reviews.title: Absolute Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Both this and the Redimp GM-200 I purchased died around 1 year after purchase, manufactured to fail after a year of service, garbage product, do not support this company by purchasing anything from them
customer_reviews.author: ETJAKEOC

customer_reviews.title: Great Keyboard, Low Price!
customer_reviews.text: I had a keyboard like this same keyboard awhile ago and spent twice as much money for it and your Redimp LED Backlit Gaming Keyboard works just as good if not better for half the price! I diffently will & would buy another one!
customer_reviews.author: R. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: I really like this product
customer_reviews.text: thank you very much, I really like this product, it has good quality and price, I enjoy when I use it, but I use it every day. Good Keyboard. Works good for gaming.
customer_reviews.author: Ruslan I. Kovalenko

customer_reviews.title: Overall great product!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my sister who loves gaming! Came in perfect condition and my sister loves it!! Really bright backlight colors and works great for typing. I love how the enter and space bar keys are bigger like how old keyboards used to be!
customer_reviews.author: DG13

customer_reviews.title: Perfect budget Gaming Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: The Redimp keyboard is a fantastic setup for a gamer. The keys are all extremely responsive and the added protection against water ensures that the keys will continuing working even if you accidentally spill something on them. The ergonomics of the keyboard are satisfying and the layout of all the keys are perfectly placed. LED backlight is a tad bit dim but during the day I still don't have any issues seeing the keys and picking them out from the rest. To save some money and get the same quality as a much higher priced keyboard, make sure to check out this keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: TechReview

customer_reviews.title: Good cheap keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only had it for a week and of course it shouldn’t break in a week but it’s a really nice cheap keyboard for either making your setup look cool or for gaming it’s not exactly like a mechanical keyboard but like it says in the description it feels like a mechanical
customer_reviews.author: Arek Hladysz

customer_reviews.title: Good keyboard but spacebar issue is glaring
customer_reviews.text: I like the keyboard for the most part, but the annoying spacebar issue makes writing take extra time, and I write upwards of 3000 words a week for my side job, so it's really almost not worth the trouble. I see from the reviews that the company is aware of the issue and seems to have resolved it in newer models--I was hoping there was an easy fix but it seems to be a mechanical issue.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money on this keyboard! Terrible product - misleading as it is sub-par for gaming.
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for gaming and ended up having it replaced thinking it was just a rare fail - space bar double enters and sticks when used for gaming as it is advertised as a "gaming" keyboard. The replacement worked for 1/2 hour and then started exhibiting the same symptoms, so I'm sending it back and going with something different. Absolutely terrible product, I've had $10 keyboards work great for gaming although the only lasted a year, I expected more from this one.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Gray

customer_reviews.title: Backlighting is too bright
customer_reviews.text: The backlighting is too bright even when turned down. Can't turn if off because you can't see the letters on the keyboard without the backlighting. It is also very big and tall. I cannot use and it is too late to return it. I do not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Call Me Cat

customer_reviews.title: Nice Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this keyboard for about a month(?)... and this is one of the nicest keyboards I've seen for the price. I give it five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son. He loves it! The package was not damaged, it arrived in a timely fashion and even included a key remover and brush for easy cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: dersypie

customer_reviews.title: Great keyboard for the price not rgb not mechanical but really good
customer_reviews.text: Was awesome. Not rgb so colors don't change. Sounds great. Feels great. Well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Doug in AZ

customer_reviews.title: but I instantly enjoyed the keyboard cleaning kit that came with it
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I are a little nerdy and we are also a lil clumsy. We have killed many keyboards with spills. Hopefully I never test this keyboard as far as spills go, but I instantly enjoyed the keyboard cleaning kit that came with it. The colors are fun and the keys are very responsive. Very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: An Okay Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes the Caps lock button will not respond to my input until I press really hard. Other than that, it's pretty and gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Dulce M.

customer_reviews.title: Super cool
customer_reviews.text: My son really likes this keyboard. He wanted one where the letters and numbers wouldn't wear off with time. The light up feature makes it even cooler. Happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: TJinSB

customer_reviews.title: Looks cool - don't buy it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my child's computer because it looks like a cool gaming keyboard and I thought he would be excited about it. He was, but the keyboard is impossible to type on with any speed and get the right keys. That was manageable, but a couple months after we bought it the back light went out on the keyboard and since the letters are only visible through the back light the keyboard now is essentially useless. Not worth your money!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Beukelman

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Haven't tested water resistance and I hope I never accidentally test it.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Arkey

customer_reviews.title: Nice keyboard with TRUE click!
customer_reviews.text: The pros of this keyboard are many: backlit keyboard, true CLICK on keystroke, side number pad and large backspace and enter key. The only negative is the design including a ramped up wrist rest makes it not quite fit my keyboard drawer. I have to push it back scraping at the top to clear the desk edge.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money
customer_reviews.text: Surprised at the keyboard it’s very sturdy and love the back light. I’ve had it for 2 days and played online and had no problems very happy
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Spacebar adds two spaces even when you only press it once!
customer_reviews.text: I primarily bought this for my home office as I work from home once a week; however, on occasion, I still game. I purchased this keyboard with the intent of using it for both work and pleasure. Unfortunately, the space bar is extremely sensitive and adds two spaces even if you only press it once, which makes it extremely frustrating to use for word processing. It’s essentially useless for me as an office keyboard. I’m disappointed with Redimp with regard to this product.
customer_reviews.author: James Waltenburg

customer_reviews.title: Adequate for price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item because I needed a lighted keyboard. It does what it is supposed to. When you press the keys they have a long travel and are a little clunky and inconsistent. But still, the price of the keyboard is very low And that is all I wanted to spend.
customer_reviews.author: ANDY THE BLIND MAN

customer_reviews.title: Really good for the price
customer_reviews.text: My husband plugged it into our Mac and it works perfectly. My son loves it but I think the lights aren’t as bright as I thought it would be but I’m not a tech savvy not sure if that’s how all gaming keyboards come. I like the fact that it’s affordable, does the job, and it’s water resistant.
customer_reviews.author: sweetriz

customer_reviews.title: The beybord is quiet and fells buttery smoth
customer_reviews.text: No issues works great one button was stuck when it was new but after taping the key allitle it didn’t stick eneymore
customer_reviews.author: A. Majors

customer_reviews.title: Great keyboard
customer_reviews.text: This is a very Nice keyboard. Sleek design. Nice pop back on keys. Lights are amazing. The keys sit a little high and the shift key is a little hard for me to use gaming. But I will still re buy, especially for this price!! Have had it a few months and still working well
customer_reviews.author: spcreationz

customer_reviews.title: ... the additional weight and feel of this keyboard is great. My only thought would me in the shift ...
customer_reviews.text: I am not a gamer3 but havew a heavy hand when typing so the additional weight and feel of this keyboard is great. My only thought would me in the shift number like !@#$ are small and do not seem to get lit up.
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: Good jeyo
customer_reviews.text: Bought this so that my son can play on my IMac without damaging my keyboard, it works perfect. It is a little noisy but I don’t care
customer_reviews.author: benjamin rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: The Space Bar.....
customer_reviews.text: I love the lighting, but the space bar feels a bit twitchy/glitched and seems to be double spacing a lot whenever I'm typing. It could just be needing some working in, but for now I'm leaving the review as is. I don't plan on testing out the Water Resistant feature anytime soon I hope.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: The keyboard worked very well till my son dropped it about 2 foot onto carpet. Now the D key does not work well. It looks really good with the back lighting! Was reasonably priced. Received quickly!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: space bar is stupid.
customer_reviews.text: I got this less than a week ago, and like many others i've noticed the space bar is stupidly sensitive. i'm very unhappy with this keyboard. i look like a moron whenever i type, or i have to take 33x longer to type anything out because this keyboard adds 3-5 extra spaces at random.
customer_reviews.author: Jewels

customer_reviews.title: I love the colors and great accuracy with gaming controls
customer_reviews.text: I use this product all the time! I love the colors and great accuracy with gaming controls.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good keyboard.
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this for my ps4 so I didn't have to use sony's floating QWERTY. Works great. Good communication between both the ps4 and keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Arid Flesh

customer_reviews.title: GREAT CUSTOMER SERIVCE
customer_reviews.text: so i had an issue with the first key board i received. It was uneven and i had to use folded paper to balance it. I informed then and they sent out a replacement super quick. I love it it's perfect now.
customer_reviews.author: MadGin726

customer_reviews.title: It came in good condition, the keys lit up and everything but ...
customer_reviews.text: It came in good condition, the keys lit up and everything but when I opened up the lifts in the back, it was slightly uneven. The keyboard is a little wobbly but not too bad and nonetheless, a good keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Shiroholo

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but solid
customer_reviews.text: i'v not had any problems with this keyboard so far you get you pay for though you can't change the led pattern it stays a rainbow color it's honestly not great but if you need a cheap but solid keyboard it gets the job done just don't expect it to come with all the bells and whistles
customer_reviews.author: clint

customer_reviews.title: spacebar
customer_reviews.text: Youwouldthinksomething as important as a spacebar would be implemented right. not only doesthe spacebar not work all the time but if it does then its 50/50 if it's goingto be a double space. DONOT BUY.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew W. Sisler

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard makes me the talk of my office lol it works great and looks good now every one wants one!
customer_reviews.author: jamil

customer_reviews.title: Good buy.
customer_reviews.text: I love this keyboard. I am a casual WoW player and this keyboard is exactly what I wanted. It is heavy enough that it does not slide around on my desk and I get that clicky sound and feel of a mechanical without the price.
customer_reviews.author: Symfora

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product, returning it for a refund
customer_reviews.text: had this for 9 days and it died. Not a good product, returning it for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not expensive, but cheap
customer_reviews.text: The "Space" key fails sometimes: sometimes it results with two spaces after one stroke, sometimes no space at all, especially when the stroke is not strong enough. Poor visibility of Icons, especially in dark conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Marek P

customer_reviews.title: Great keyboard, great price
customer_reviews.text: After a few weeks of trying this keyboard out, I have to say it's pretty awesome. I had to acclimate myself to the enter key being a bit abnormal compared to most since the forward slash key was moved to the left of the enter key instead of above it. Overall, the responsiveness of the keys and comfort level are great for this price. I would definitely recommend this keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Is seems to be fine... gaming keyboards are loud, clunky and this one is not as big and bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Echan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great keyboard and priced that I want to buy one for all of my office staff,
customer_reviews.author: Patrick S. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Would be 5 stars but i was hoping for a slighly larger padded wrist rest.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Hagadus

customer_reviews.title: Broke within two months.
customer_reviews.text: Had it for just over two months before it went haywire and broke. Maybe it's water damage, because my keys are all malfunctioning. Not worth buying another one.
customer_reviews.author: Traci Schaeffer

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Have been using the keyboard for about a month now with no issues. My son loves it for gaming. Works great with my older iMac
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: I like the keyboard but it is loud
customer_reviews.text: I like the keyboard but it is loud. Also it is very hard to read the upper numbers and symbols. The lights look cool! I also love the big typewriter type keys.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Very cool!
customer_reviews.text: I love this keyboard! The colors on it are very pretty! Everyone that has seen it wants one. I might have a few friends that order! I was so excited about this and the matching mouse that I ordered, I took pictures and decided to take photos! I highly recommend this keyboard if you want something unique!
customer_reviews.author: Justin Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great Keyboard at a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Good sturdy keyboard. The RGB lighting is nice. It's a good quality keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Headline: keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Wish the lights did a little more but it works for what I need it to do. The enter button is slightly annoying but I can manage.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: so far it worked just fine, no issues
customer_reviews.text: so far it worked just fine, no issues. If you want a full sized keyboard it get the job done and the light help in lower light
customer_reviews.author: M. J.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: its great. only thing i wish was that it had more settings other that solid and breathe
customer_reviews.author: raisean

customer_reviews.title: Large old school keys
customer_reviews.text: Very "clacky" like older keyboards as I'm used to nearly flush keys these days. Thankfully don't know about waterproof, love having numerical side keys and backlight.
customer_reviews.author: Arne D. Melsom

customer_reviews.title: keys are lit
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my father so he could see the keys in a dark room. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff L.

customer_reviews.title: it's p good but some keys can be difficult to see
customer_reviews.text: the keyboard is really cool, and i do like it a lot and would recommend it if it's what you're looking for. the only problem i have with it is that the keys on the keyboard aren't super clear or apparent. what i mean is that the symbol keys are just kind of hard to see unless you look at it rather close. but other than that the keyboard was pretty cool! i like the colors underneath the keys, especially since ive always wanted a keyboard like this. thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly May

customer_reviews.title: Keys "N" it is "M" are on backwards
customer_reviews.text: I received this keyboard and absolutely love it. However, I just noticed that the key "N" it is "M" are placed on the keyboard backwards as when I hit "N" it is "M" in emails and word and the same of "M" key. I do not want to dismantle the keyboard and not sure what to do as far as resolving this issue. Any advice would be highly appreciated. Attached are photos I took with my phone. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: MONTGOMERY ERIKSEN

customer_reviews.title: Reasonably priced ergonomic keyboard.
customer_reviews.text: Lights up well with easy to read characters when lit.
customer_reviews.author: Judy DeAntonellis

customer_reviews.title: Unable to change the background color on led. The ...
customer_reviews.text: Unable to change the background color on led. The keyboard isn't as wide as I expected. Still works ok. WARNING. THIS HAS LOUD KEYS
customer_reviews.author: Kristian

customer_reviews.title: cool product
customer_reviews.text: my kids love to spill drinks on the keyboard, gone thru several. not anymore. they also love the colors on the keyboard
customer_reviews.author: Judy Pitsenbarger
